content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron Ore Mine at position(-17.0, -50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position (-17.0, -50.0)) and a transport belt at position (-16.5, -51.5)
-  Burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) and a transport belt at position (-14.5, -51.5)
-  Burner inserter (position (-13.5, -50.5)) that puts into transport belt at position (-14.5, -51.5)
-  Burner inserter (position (-13.5, -48.5)) that puts into transport belt at position (-12.5, -48.5)

### Iron Plate Factory at position(-10.0, -49.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position (-10.0, -49.0)) that smelts iron ore into iron plate
-  Transport belt group that connects the furnace at position (-10.0, -49.0) to the iron ore mine

### Storage at position(-16.5, -47.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Wooden chest (position (-16.5, -47.5)) that stores items
-  Burner inserter (position (-16.5, -46.5)) that puts items into the wooden chest

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when mining without fuel
-  Make sure to fuel the burner mining drill before mining
### Errors when smelting without ingredients
-  Ensure that the furnace has the necessary ingredients to smelt
### Errors when inserting items without source items
-  Make sure that the inserter has source items to insert into the destination
### Errors when placing entities without clearing the area
-  Ensure that the area is clear of items and entities before placing a new entity

### NAMESPACE
*   Defined functions: None
*   Invoked functions: None
*   Important variables:
    *   `inventory`: a dictionary of items in the agent's inventory, with item names as keys and quantities as values
    *   `entities`: a list of entities on the map, with each entity represented as a dictionary of its properties
    *   `position`: a tuple representing the agent's current position on the map
